materials.raw_text: Co: 16 g, Nd: 1 g, P: 12 g, Pr: 5 g, W: 2 g

sourcing.instructions: Co (Cobalt): Available at metal supply stores or online metal suppliers. Nd (Neodymium): Specialty chemical suppliers or online rare earth suppliers. P (Phosphorus): Chemical supply companies or online markets. Pr (Praseodymium): Specialty chemical suppliers. W (Tungsten): Metal supply stores or online metal suppliers.
steps: Co (Cobalt): Available at metal supply stores or online metal suppliers. Nd (Neodymium): Specialty chemical suppliers or online rare earth suppliers. P (Phosphorus): Chemical supply companies or online markets. Pr (Praseodymium): Specialty chemical suppliers. W (Tungsten): Metal supply stores or online metal suppliers.

1. Weigh each ingredient accurately on a digital scale. 2. In a clean and dry mixing bowl, combine the weighed amounts of Co, Nd, P, Pr, and W. 3. Use a spatula to gently stir the mixture until all components are uniformly distributed. 4. Transfer the mixture to a ceramic crucible for further processing.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh each ingredient accurately on a digital scale. 2. In a clean and dry mixing bowl, combine the weighed amounts of Co, Nd, P, Pr, and W. 3. Use a spatula to gently stir the mixture until all components are uniformly distributed. 4. Transfer the mixture to a ceramic crucible for further processing.

steps: 1. Place the crucible in a furnace. 2. Set the furnace temperature to 1200째C. 3. Allow the mixture to heat for 4 hours to ensure complete melting and alloying of the materials.
heating.raw_text: 1. Place the crucible in a furnace. 2. Set the furnace temperature to 1200째C. 3. Allow the mixture to heat for 4 hours to ensure complete melting and alloying of the materials.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 25째C). 2. The cooling process should take about 6-8 hours.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 25째C). 2. The cooling process should take about 6-8 hours.

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the crucible. 2. Inspect for any surface imperfections. 3. If necessary, use fine grit sandpaper to smooth out the surfaces. 4. Optionally, apply a protective sealant to enhance durability and prevent oxidation.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the crucible. 2. Inspect for any surface imperfections. 3. If necessary, use fine grit sandpaper to smooth out the surfaces. 4. Optionally, apply a protective sealant to enhance durability and prevent oxidation.
